item.description:
Join NHC'er Selam in celebrating a great day for those who have been dying to see Bush leave the White House and, of course, to celebrate the historic Inaugration of Barack Obama, our first African American President.


***
01/09/2009 Update
Here are a few major changes for the Inaugural Celebration
event at Geronimo:

- Geronimo doors will now be open to the public at 12noon

- Specials will be offered to all, starting at 12pm, all day,
all night!

- Please replace current specials with the following:
• Assorted apps
• $5 House Wines
• $4.50 House Drinks
• $3 Bud light
• $3 Coors Light
• $5 Geronimo Margaritas
• $7 Spicy margaritas

- Because the specials are now being offered to ALL Geronimo
customers on that day, the owners have offered complimentary
champagne to New Haven Collective members only, so wear your
wristbands!

- I will give out wristbands at the Bentara HH on Jan 12th, and
also on the 20th, at 5pm (If anyone is coming before 5pm, call
me to arrange pickup)

Please note my NEW cell#: (203) 745-9645

Thanks!!!

From 6pm til 8pm Geronimo will be offering complimentary food (including ribs, quesadillas, and shrimp) and the following drink specials: Bud light $3, Coors Light $3, $5 "Geronimo" margaritas, and $7 "Spicy" margaritas.

To take advantage of the drink specials, get a wristband from Selam. If you have any questions, she can be reached at (203) 745-9645
item.name: Inauguration Day Celebration at Geronimo
